phrase: I hurt my knee the other day when I was running around with my niece... I fell and I twisted my knee in some funky way.
Honestly it's been hurting on both sides more on the inside than the the outside.
It started off as a four but it's getting worse and it's starting it's a throbbing pain.
I've been taking some Tylenol... and wrapped it with kinesiology tape.
I can't take any Advil or ibuprofen
The Tylenol helps a little bit but it's got a time limit... by hour or two it hurts again.
Edema and effusion noted... moderate range of motion... pain on flexion and extension... negative Lachman's test and a negative valgus and varus test.
X-ray of your left knee... was normal... no fractures no bony abnormalities.
I believe you have a MCL strain or a medial collateral ligament... strained that ligament there.

I'm going to give you tramadol 50 mg twice a day... knee immobilizer for the next week... ice 3 or 4 times a day... don't want you to be running probably for the next three weeks... call if getting worse.
